arts.ttl: Serie A | Como 2-0 Lecce: Match Report
arts.sum: Como secured a vital victory against Lecce in Serie A on Monday evening, with goals from Nico Paz and Patrick Cutrone leading the team to a 2-0 win at home. This result allowed the newly promoted side to climb above Lecce in the league standings, moving into 15th place. The post Serie A | Como 2-0 Lecce: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Ancelotti addresses Roma rumours and Como talent Nico Paz
arts.sum: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti shared his thoughts on various football topics during a recent interview with Radio Anch'Io lo Sport on Radio1. The Italian coach addressed the situation at Milan and Roma, the Serie A title race, and the promising young talent Nico Paz. arts.ttl: Serie A | Como v Lecce: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: As Como prepares to host Lecce in their upcoming Serie A fixture, manager Cesc Fabregas is expected to revert to a more familiar 4-2-3-1 formation. This tactical shift comes after experimenting with a three-man central defense against Inter Milan in their previous match. The post Serie A | Como v Lecce: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Como vs. Lecce to get out of the danger zone
arts.sum: Como are unbeaten in home matches against Lecce between Serie A and B(in 11 previous games, nine wins and two draws). Lecce are the team against whom Como have played the most Serie A matches without ever losing: three wins and one draw in four previous matches against this opponent.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Como v Lecce: Match Preview
arts.sum: As the curtain falls on 2024, Como and Lecce prepare for a pivotal Serie A encounter at Stadio Sinigaglia on Monday. With just a single point separating these relegation-threatened sides, both teams will be eager to secure a vital victory to boost their survival hopes. The post Serie A | Como v Lecce: Match Preview appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Fabregas: ‘Nico Paz sacrificed a lot at San Siro, Dele Alli is training with Como’
arts.sum: Como head coach Cesc Fabregas held a press conference ahead of Monday's match against Lecce, providing updates on team news and reflecting on recent performances. The former Arsenal and Chelsea midfielder, now in his first full season as a manager, discussed various aspects of his team's preparation and individual player performances. The post Fabregas: ‘Nico Paz sacrificed a lot at San Siro, Dele Alli is training with Como’ appeared first on FootItalia.com.
